snippet: KT Sullivan and Jeff Harnar’s “Our Time” reinterprets Stephen Sondheim’s songs for the era of same-sex marriage and the dissolution of traditional roles.
abstract: Stephen Holden reviews performance by singers KT Sullivan and Jeff Harnar at Laurie Beechman Theater.
lead_paragraph: KT Sullivan and Jeff Harnar’s “Our Time” reinterprets Stephen Sondheim’s songs for the era of same-sex marriage and the dissolution of traditional roles.

headline.seo: KT Sullivan and Jeff Harnar Reflect a New Era
